review: Had this car for 6 months and the engine started making loud noises. It got progressively worse until it completely died on the highway. Very dangerous situation that could have caused an accident. The dealer took forever to fix it.
Brake system malfunction while I was driving in heavy traffic. The brakes felt soft and unresponsive. This is a serious safety issue and should be recalled immediately.
The paint on the hood started cracking after just 2 years. Not acceptable for a new vehicle purchase. The dealer said it's cosmetic but it looks terrible now.

Transmission keeps slipping when I accelerate. Takes forever to get up to speed on the highway. Having to shift gears manually most of the time. Dealership says they need to replace the whole transmission.
Air conditioning stopped working in the middle of summer. The dealership found a refrigerant leak. Had to wait 2 weeks for parts. This was extremely inconvenient.
Hearing strange grinding noise from the suspension when driving over bumps. Very concerning. Took it to the shop and they said multiple suspension components need replacement.
Rust has started forming on the undercarriage after 18 months. The rust protection coating doesn't seem adequate for the harsh winter conditions in my area.
Transmission jerks and hesitates during gear changes. Makes driving very uncomfortable. Getting worse over time. Dealer says it might be the transmission control module.
